level.heading: Effect of amendment or revocation of anatomical gift upon Registry.

level.text: If a donor amends an anatomical gift, or revokes one or more, but not all, anatomical gifts, the Registry shall be promptly revised to reflect the gift or gifts as amended.
If a donor revokes all anatomical gifts, the name of the former donor shall be promptly removed from the Registry.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 17-145, see notes following ยง 7-1531.01.
